channel.title: Comments on: Joshua Ferris’ tribute to David Foster Wallace

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I enjoyed Then We Came to the End as well. So much so that I read Delillo's Americana, which I also enjoyed. Thanks for sharing Ferris' article.
item.content:encoded: I enjoyed Then We Came to the End as well. So much so that I read Delillo’s Americana, which I also enjoyed. Thanks for sharing Ferris’ article.

item.title: By: Big City Sheep
item.dc:creator: Big City Sheep
item.description: The tributes on McSweeneys were poignant. :(

item.title: By: Drew Harkins
item.dc:creator: Drew Harkins
item.description: I really enjoyed Then We Came to the End. Good find on the article.
item.content:encoded: I really enjoyed Then We Came to the End. Good find on the article.
